title: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Place the salmon in a rolodex or clean plastic bag.
Add the garlic, yellow squash, lemon juice, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Bake for 15 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Add the wine vinegar and continue baking for another 10 to 15 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

title: Fish Tacos
steps: Cook the salmon on the grill until itâ€™s pink and opaque, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
While the salmon is cooking, warm the tortillas in a microwave safe bowl to room temperature.
Place the salmon on the hot tortillas, top with the rice, butter, jack cheese, monterey jack cheese, sour cream, cilantro, and season with salt and pepper.
